name: Aceternity UI
description: A border that moves around the container. Perfect for making your buttons stand out.

props.Description: Optional. Defines the border radius of the button. Default value is "1.75rem".
Required. The content to be displayed inside the button.
Optional. Defines the HTML element or React component that will be used for the button. Default is "button".
Optional. Additional CSS classes to be applied to the button container.
Optional. Additional CSS classes to be applied to the button border.
Optional. Duration for the moving border animation in milliseconds. Default is 2000.
Optional. Additional CSS classes to be applied to the button.
Optional. Any other props that should be passed to the button.

usage_notes: A border that moves around the container. Perfect for making your buttons stand out.
